channel.title: Pk Items & Staff Items
channel.description: Hey guys I need some help with items I want to know 2 things first thing is how do I add pk points to the item for example I want D plate in the pk shop but you need 500pk points. The other thing is how do I add a rank to an item so you have to be mod to wear a cape or something... Thanks guys

item.title: Pk Items & Staff Items
item.dc:creator: @WowILikeToCode WowILikeToCode
item.description:
@WowILikeToCode wrote:

I think it should be

if(itemId == #### && !hasRights =< 1) {

that means more than or equal to player rights 1

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Items & Staff Items
item.dc:creator: @lord_killord lord killord
item.description:
@lord_killord wrote:

[quote=“Hypocryte, post:2, topic:330557”] if(itemId == #### && !hasRights(3)) { sM("You do not meet the minimum rights requirement to wield this item."); return; } [/quote]

umm … shouldnt it be:

if(itemId == #### && !hasRights <3 {

?

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Items & Staff Items
item.dc:creator: @Hypocryte Hypocryte
item.description:
@Hypocryte wrote:

if(itemId == #### && !hasRights(3)) {
sM("You do not meet the minimum rights requirement to wield this item.");
return;
}

Read full topic
